title: The Complete Guide to Digital Painting Vol 2 - 2009  UK
description:
The Complete Guide to Digital Painting Vol 2 - 2009  UK

260 Pages | True PDF | English | 53 MB 


Whether you're a raw beginner or a fully fledged digital artist, you'll find a wealth of content in these pages to enable you to work from photos and sketches alike to create your very own digital masterpieces. We start off with a section on preperation and on some of the top techniques for established art styles, before moving on to a range of inspirational and sometimes experimental tutorials. Corel Painter's software enables anyone to become a digital artist, and this book is packed with inspirational guides to get you started. After reading through all of the advice, you will have the knowledge to create your own masterpieces! Included in this book are Tool and brush techniques, How to build up colour and shading, Re-create some of the world's greatist artists styles and much more.
